UniprotID	O60895
Accession	O60895;A7L9S6;K7EMD3;Q8N1F2
EntryName	RAMP2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Receptor activity-modifying protein 2 (Calcitonin-receptor-like receptor activity-modifying protein 2) (CRLR activity-modifying protein 2)
GeneName	RAMP2
Length	175
Function	Accessory protein that interacts with and modulates the function of G-protein coupled receptors including calcitonin gene-related peptide type 1 receptor (CALCRL) and calcitonin receptor (CALCR) (PubMed:9620797). Required for the transport of CALCRL to the plasma membrane (PubMed:9620797). Together with CALCRL, form a receptor complex for adrenomedullin/ADM (PubMed:22102369, PubMed:32296767, PubMed:9620797). Together with CALCR, act as a receptor complex for calcitonin/CT/CALC (PubMed:35324283). Together with CALCR, also act as a receptor complex for amylin/IAPP (PubMed:35324283).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
Disorder	0.3807,0.4619,0.4801,0.3840,0.4507,0.4619,0.4901,0.5017,0.4476,0.4652,0.4725,0.5419,0.5382,0.5098,0.5055,0.5055,0.4831,0.3840,0.3117,0.2609,0.1852,0.1852,0.1399,0.1028,0.1007,0.0909,0.1092,0.1007,0.1162,0.1373,0.0870,0.0765,0.0704,0.0985,0.0704,0.1298,0.1399,0.2129,0.2918,0.3774,0.4831,0.5758,0.5707,0.6322,0.7209,0.8125,0.8085,0.6991,0.7036,0.6948,0.5854,0.7163,0.7595,0.7036,0.5665,0.6948,0.5055,0.4017,0.2849,0.2918,0.2752,0.1554,0.1528,0.1643,0.1583,0.1275,0.1349,0.1476,0.1298,0.1476,0.1373,0.2399,0.1323,0.0734,0.0967,0.0780,0.0592,0.0967,0.0985,0.1731,0.1583,0.1914,0.1914,0.1881,0.1852,0.1092,0.1323,0.1349,0.0676,0.0690,0.0690,0.0676,0.0300,0.0483,0.0967,0.0531,0.0506,0.0662,0.0483,0.0870,0.0433,0.0531,0.0473,0.1048,0.0631,0.0494,0.0967,0.0967,0.0494,0.0494,0.0405,0.0414,0.0443,0.0835,0.1070,0.0531,0.0851,0.0817,0.0618,0.1137,0.0618,0.1184,0.0605,0.0372,0.0341,0.0690,0.0851,0.0364,0.0364,0.0719,0.1424,0.2715,0.2680,0.2783,0.2224,0.1399,0.1449,0.1323,0.1914,0.1476,0.0851,0.1251,0.1449,0.1424,0.1184,0.0618,0.0306,0.0341,0.0320,0.0194,0.0115,0.0105,0.0069,0.0052,0.0040,0.0036,0.0045,0.0056,0.0060,0.0071,0.0092,0.0146,0.0143,0.0136,0.0181,0.0248,0.0349,0.0506,0.0313,0.0605,0.1007,0.1611,0.1229,0.2193,0.3087
